page.title: 03IRVINE ** INDUSTRY
page.content:
The aim of the New Town has been to attract{new industry}to the area by offering financial grants and allowances.We visited one very big company and one of the typical smaller companies, which have been attracted to Irvine.
Our reports on these are on the following pages.
There are many we did not visit, for example :_
{Digital (electronics) {Climax (computers) {Prestwick Circuits (electronics) {Humepipe (concrete pipes) {Wilson Sporting Goods (golf clubs) {Flow Laboratories (chemicals) {Dolphin (hydraulics)
